lines.text: It is also locked. Animal-shape inside?
Wait! They are not zombies, they are just pandas.
Why are pandas locked in a bar?
One of my father’s subsidiary companies employs fish as waiters.
The service is terrible, but that ’s a good way to get samples of fish’s nerve impulses.
Could we take one panda back as our food?
Don’t do that. They have reasons to be locked here.
